name: Speak Your Mind
description:
Welcome to the downloading page for Speak Your Mind! This game was created in the Fall of 2021 at the University of Utah for the EAE 3720 Alternative Game Development Class. It is a game about the struggles of social anxiety and overcoming these struggles. The game features many exciting minigames as well as multiple paths. When you play this game make sure to speak your mind!

Here is a link to a trailer for the game: 

Controls are as follows:

Mouse for Dialog options and making choices

Movement is W,A,S,D

Use the mouse and the movement keys when picking up and interacting with objects.
